name: Minesweeper (sidmac)
description:
Simple minesweeper made on/with PICO-8. 

Arrow keys to move, Z to clear, X to flag.

Z to start, X to restart on failure, and 

right arrow to play again after win.

Download and peruse the cartridge and 

source code if you have PICO-8!

Comment your highest score, and your best time 

Did you find the legendary 8?

music, art, code by Clark Shaeffer. Minesweeper originally by Microsoft.
